main event: Several bright lights, white and orange, were observed flying erratically before striking the ground in North Carolina, bursting into flames and creating a crater.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes,The object appeared to be the size of a C-47,The brilliant lights extinguished shortly after the object struck the ground,The incident was reported and investigated under both Project 10573 and Project Blue Book,The sighting remains unexplained after investigation, prompting a recommendation for further evaluation.
witness description: No specific witnesses confirmed in the report.
